docs.snippet: Clemson Coach Dabo Swinney has been accused of creating a culture on his team that goes too far in promoting Christianity, but he says his job is to win football games....
docs.lead_paragraph: Clemson Coach Dabo Swinney has been accused of creating a culture on his team that goes too far in promoting Christianity, but he says his job is to win football games.
docs.abstract: William C Rhoden Sports of The Times column on Clemson football coach Dabo Swinney, who has been accused of creating culture on his team that goes too far in promoting Christianity; asserts realistic head coaches, like Swinney, know most important part of their job is to win games, not save young souls.

headline.print_headline: Winning, the Religious Devotion That Unites All Coaches

docs.snippet: Deliberate planning for leisure, concentrating on activities that refresh and reinvigorate, may actually mean more fun for less money....
docs.lead_paragraph: Deliberate planning for leisure, concentrating on activities that refresh and reinvigorate, may actually mean more fun for less money.
docs.abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column examines theories about planning for travel and vacation using same tools used in careful financial planning; holds thoughtful approach ensures that leisure-time choices are not only cost-effective but truly restorative.

headline.main: Think Seriously About Spending for Play
headline.print_headline: Why Planning for Play Deserves Serious Thought

docs.snippet: Two professional women’s teams faced off for the first time at the N.H.L.’s marquee regular-season event....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two professional women’s teams faced off for the first time at the N.H.L.’s marquee regular-season event.
docs.abstract: Boston Pride of National Women's Hockey League ties Les Canadiennes of Canadian Women's Hockey League, 1-1, in inaugural Outdoor Women’s Classic at Gillette Stadium; Pride player Denna Laing is injured after losing her footing, raising concerns about ice conditions that were questioned earlier in day.

headline.main: Ice Problems and Injury Plague Women’s Debut at the Winter Classic
